text: The main features of the study population are described in Table 2 . Sixty - five percent of children ( = 394 ) were males , while the rest of them ( = 209 ; 35 % ) were females . The median age of the patients was 3 . 1 years ( range : 2 months - 14 years ) . Forty hundred fifty - nine patients were younger than 6 years ( median 2 . 1 years ; = 206 < 2 years ; = 253 ≥ 2 years and < 6 years ) , while the rest of them ( = 144 ; 24 % ) were school - aged children and adolescents ( median 8 . 7 years ) .
